programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a trip down memory lane when the Docs find an old childhood photo and reminisce about their first meeting so many years ago. It all started at Lab School, when Specs was a naive dork and Skinny was the school ruffian. A lot has changed since then, of course. Specs is now the tough guy, and Skinny is now the dork, and their early adventures set in motion a bunch of other consequences, too. Embittered, angry boss? Check. Moustachioed Chief of Police with an age-old grudge? Check. Also dont forget the lab experiment that went spectacularly wrong. That orange blob in the test tube: did that just move?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Amazing World of Gumball revolves around the life of Gumball Watterson a 12-year-old cat who attends middle school in the fictional city of Elmore. Accompanied by his adoptive goldfish brother and best friend Darwin he frequently finds himself involved in various shenanigans around the city during which he interacts with his other family members - sister Anais and parents Nicole and Richard - and an extended supporting cast of characters. With relatable themes and a unique cast of characters The Amazing World of Gumball exemplifies the funny amazing sweet and optimistic side of kids everyday life. Injected with a good deal of humor and unpredictable nonsense Gumballs world reflects the modern family and everyday issues that kids understand.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Darwin asks Gumball to teach him how to skate Gumball makes sure that he covers every aspect of the skating lifestyle - from wearing the right gear using the right terms and choosing the right board. But when Darwin finally gets his wheels rolling he realises there might be one important aspect of skating that Gumball hasnt taught him...

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!

Goblin, who uses the Titans pet peeves against them. / When they receive a distress call from the TTG animators and artists, the Titans must tone down their actions and avoid big adventures. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons try and reconnect Darwin to his fish roots. When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. So the family try to re-connect him with his aquatic culture; they try fish-food fish-language even fish clothes. But when none of it works they realize they may have to let him go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo: Moon Monster Madness
programme.desc: Its a giant leap for dog-kind as Scooby-Doo and the gang blast off for an epic, otherworldly adventure in this all-new original movie! After winning the last five seats in a lottery, Scooby-Doo, Shaggy, Fred, Daphne and Velma are off to space in billionaire Sly Barons brand-new ship, the Sly Star One. Its all gravity-free fun until a mysterious alien begins destroying the ship! The crew is forced to land on Sly Barons base ... on the dark side of the moon! Will the gang unravel this alien mystery? Will Scooby-Doo and Shaggy find snacks on the moon? Will Fred ever take his space helmet off?! Journey to the outer limits with Scooby-Doo to find out!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom sees Darwin gazing longingly at a fish-tank she thinks their mammalian lifestyle isnt fulfilling her adopted son and deep down he longs to connect with his fishy roots. / The Parent Teacher Association of Elmore Junior High bans video games, so the kids try and prove that games arent a bad influence. / Tobias follows every single high-five with a butt-slap so when Gumball doesnt get one he feels insulted. He tries to get Tobias to slap his rear all day but it doesnt work. Director: Mic Graves,.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig and his two best friends, Kelsey and JP, are always going on adventures in the untamed suburban wilderness known as the Creek - a kid utopia where tribes of children rule over tree forts and bike ramps, making up an entire kid society. Each episode finds the kids either venturing into unexplored areas of the Creek, encountering new Creek Kids, or just getting into trouble at their hang out - the Stump.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When an unknown figure shows up and insults their Mom the kids are expecting a massive showdown but are surprised when Mom chooses the path of peace. Mom explains Yuki Masamis mother is an old school friend and repeatedly refuses to fight her despite further provocation. However when Yuki threatens to get Mom fired from her job Mom has no choice but to partake in a rematch of a karate match her and Yuki had fought as children.

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs run out of puff and decide to cut some corners. All it takes is a sharpie, as it happens; just change a wanted poster to offer a huge reward, and bingo! The public are gonna do your work for you. Weirdly quickly, a hard-boiled granny shows up with Lamput under her arm. Things turn ugly when she actually expects to be paid the reward. Most unreasonable. Not even an odd-jobs montage can pay this giant bill; the Docs get desperate and turn to crime, which works about as well for them as it usually does. Specs and Skinny end up in the clink, the granny pockets a heap of cash, and Lamput is yet again the one that got away.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Mom has forced Dad to install a password on the computer. The pop-up clue advises them that the password is the name of Dads favorite child. After trying "Gumball" and "Darwin" unsuccessfully, they discover the answer is, in fact, "Anais". They are determined to become Dads favourites by any means necessary, even if it means undermining each other, plotting against Anais or driving a wedge between mom and dad.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Fugitive Lamput ends up in a seedy dive by the waterfront. It happens when youre on the run. These thugs sure know how to have fun, though; people come from far and wide to be creamed at arm wrestling by gigantic Mr Moustache. Its a jumpin scene - until those two dorks from the Lab walk in, and start kicking up a stink about the new extremely orange trophy thats up for grabs. The Boss (apparently an old bikie at heart) is more than up for the arm wrestling challenge. Its the bicep-off of the decade, with Lamput as the prize.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons discover a family of cartoon copycats who mimic their every move. / Grandpa Louie has a new online friend - the only problem is she isnt real. / The kids find out that Richard has been being picked on by the same person since high school. / Gumball and Darwin decide to use online reviews to wrangle free stuff. / A mysterious package shows up at the Wattersons house and they do their best to avoid opening it. / Darwin likes a girl in his class so Gumball decides its time to play cupid. / Gumballs smart answers arent the correct ones and hes forced to go back to kindergarten. / Gumball and Darwin discover the real reason Dads diet wasnt working. / Gumball discovers that Rob his old nemesis is neme-seeing someone else now.

Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Teen Titans Go!
programme.desc: Robin, Starfire, Cyborg, Beast Boy and Raven continue the fun in season seven of TEEN TITANS GO! with all-new comedic adventures, giving viewers a look at what life is really like as a teen super hero ... once the cape comes off. Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. / Nicole remembers the day she first met Richard, and the different choices she could have made.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Total DramaRama is canadian animated comedy series, spin-off of Total Drama, all characters are already well-known and loved by the audience. This time Duncan, Gwen, Courtney, Izzy, Noah, Bridgette and the rest find themselves in the past as kids and their adventures take place in kindergarten. The strict Chef Hatchet is there to keep his eye on them. Any harmless idea of the kids turns out to be a total disaster, they are irrepressible in producing new ideas on how to have fun. the kids are discussing every single decision and plan in front of the cameras just like their adult versions, being a part of a reality show.

programme.title: Bunnicula
programme.desc: Once upon a time an extraordinary bunny is born in an average family of bunnies. The little guy looks just like a vampire- he has sharp fangs, his ears remind of bat wings and plus he is scared of sunlight. Bunnicula is never out in daylight, sleeps in a coffin, flies with bat wings, and drains juice from vegetables with his fangs which gives him enormous power. His family is afraid that he will attack somebody so they lock him in an old mansion. Bunnicula has been sleeping for many years until a little girl Mina unlocks hims and makes him a new member of her family. Her dog named Harold makes friends with Bunnicula straight away but the cat Chester is a little bit scared of him and does not seem to be happy about a new pet.

programme.title: Clarence
programme.desc: Follow the daily adventures of a 10-year-old boy named Clarence, and his two best friends Sumo and Jeff. Clarence lives with his mother Mary and her boyfriend Chad in the fictional town of Aberdale, and he is optimistic, curious, honest and quirky boy, who sees the best in everyone and gets himself in a variety of funny situations and everyday problems, which he solves with lots of imagination and with the help from his friends.

Inspired by and featuring the principal voice cast of the original Teen Titans series, this character-driven comedy - based upon DC characters - focuses on the funny that happens in between saving the world and living together as teenagers without adult supervision. With epic staring contests to decide who does the laundry, a series of quests and battles to construct the perfect sandwich or fighting crime in Jump City, one thing is for sure - these Titans are always ready for an adventure, inside the house and out.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Gumball must find a way to save his relationship with Darwin after the boys are forced to live in separate rooms.

programme.title: The Wonderfully Weird World of Gumball‌
programme.desc: Welcome back to Elmore, where the laws of reality are a joke, and family life is anything but ordinary.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are a totally normal family. Dad is your regular 6"4 pink rabbit who stays at home while Mom works in a rainbow factory. Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.title: Adventure Time
programme.desc: Adventure Time is an American fantasy animated television series that shows a 12-year-old boy Finn and his best friend, a wise 28-year-old (in dog years) dog Jake with magical powers living in Lands of Ooo in post-apocalyptic world. They lean on each other during good and bad times, trust each another with secrets and look to each other for advice. Finn likes to travel and save princesses from evil monsters in Lands of Ooo. Jake is more than his friend, he is his mentor, and his extraordinary skills help the boy to fight evil. Finn and Jake hang out with Princess Bubblegum, the sovereign of the Candy Kingdom, the fearsome Ice King, an ice wizard, Marceline the Vampire Queen, a 1000-year-old vampire and rock musician and many more.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sets out to solve the mystery of who stuffed Principal Brown into his locker. / Gumball and Darwins harmless pranks on Dad spiral hopelessly out of control. / Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school. / Gumball is traumatised when accidentally kissed on the mouth by his Grandma JoJo. / Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date! / Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game. / Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him! / Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom. / Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The kids try to help Dad bond with Frankie. / When the uncomfortableness between them reaches new levels Gumball and Hot Dog Guy decide they have to confront their ongoing awkwardness by making things as awkward as possible. / The kids realise that theyve never known their neighbours name, and theyre way past the window where they can ask. / Gumball has something uncomfortable to tell Penny but doesnt know how, until he makes a deal with Principal Brown. / Gumball and Anais go head to head in a leadership election voted for by their classmates. / Clayton realises he can imitate his classmates, and begins stealing the lives of the people of Elmore. / When unexpected couples in the world of Elmore start randomly falling in love, Gumball and Darwin have to figure out whats going on. / Gumball questions Mr Smalls eco-friendly commitment, causing him to abandon society and live in the forest. Director: Mic Graves.

Their kids are pretty standard too - theres Gumball, a blue cat with a giant head, Anais, a 4 year old genius bunny, and Darwin, a pet goldfish that became part of the family when he sprouted legs. At the heart of the show is Gumball, who faces the trials and tribulations of any twelve-year-old kid - like being chased by a rampaging T-Rex, sleeping rough when a robot steals his identity, or dressing as a cheerleader and doing the splits to impress the girl of his dreams. Simple everyday issues weve all been through. Gumballs hometown of Elmore is every bit as commonplace… a cactus waters his front lawn, a furry slug drives to work, and on the corner a balloon, a potato and a ghost all wait for the school bus. Welcome to The Amazing World of Gumball, where normal just got a little bit weird…

programme.desc: One of the CNNs longest running programmes that allows viewers to find out all the global sports news, see all the important events and most interesting parts, and enjoy the interviews with sports pundits and various sports stars.

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Across music, dance and comedy, a new wave of Ugandan performers is captivating audiences, all while championing a vibrant creative culture at home. We spotlight three standout talents : Afro-soul musician Joshua Baraka, international Latin dance maestro Valentino R. Kabenge, and comedy superstar Kansiime Anne, exploring how venues like the Uganda National Cultural Centre are nurturing the next generation of Ugandan performers.

The "GPS" in the shows title stands for "Global Public Square," a reference to the shows focus on international issues and foreign affairs. The guests of the shows one-on-one interviews and roundtable discussions are most prominent figures in the world of global politics, economy and global decision-makers and influencers.

programme.title: Quests World of Wonder
programme.desc: Join our host, Richard Quest, as he takes us on a journey of discovery to some of the most iconic cities on the planet. Richard encounters many of the influential local inhabitants and delves into the heritage and culture of each city to reveal what makes them unique and fascinating. The first series sees Richard travel around the globe to visit Washington D.C. and explore the awesome power that resides in the city; in Panama City, Richard searchess for some of the legendary figures who shaped its identity; the vibrancy of Nairobi excites the imagination while Athens treis to sustain its legacy in the modern world; multi-cultural London reveals its elegant and martial history and the people of Berlin enahnce its attractions; and the exotic and singular atmosphere of Istanbul delights the senses.

programme.title: Connecting Africa
programme.desc: The African continent is going through a big transformation and this CNN magazine presents the entrepreneurs, companies and projects that are working hard to modernise it and make its economic integration possible. Hosted by Eleni Giokos, the episodes bring stories about the fast growing industry, network communication, cross-border trade and increasing trading routes, air connectivity, logistics infrastructure, small businesses and more.

programme.title: Marketplace Middle East
programme.desc: The Middle East is undergoing a healthcare revolution, with cutting-edge medical technology, increased investment, and world-class facilities transforming the sector. At the forefront of this change is Sir Magdi Yacoub, the renowned British-Egyptian heart surgeon whose groundbreaking work has saved countless lives. Now, hes bringing his expertise home with the launch of a state-of-the-art hospital in Cairo, set to become a regional center of excellence in cardiac care and research. We explore Yacoubs legacy his vision for the future of healthcare in the region. Also: in this Abu Dhabi operation theatre room, the lead surgeon, Dr. Usman Ahmad, has multiple robot arms as he conducts surgery. As the first hospital in the Gulf to successfully perform robotic lung transplants, Cleveland Clinic Abu Dhabi is at the forefront of the region, presenting a strong case for utilizing robotics in the treatment of complex thoracic conditions. We explore the importance of robotic-assisted surgery for high-risk patients and how this will transform transplant care in the wider region.

programme.title: Marketplace Africa
programme.desc: As tourist numbers continue to rise worldwide, African wildlife parks are facing unprecedented challenges. In Kenyas iconic Masai Mara Reserve, the home of the Great Migration and one of the natural wonders of the world, the number of wildebeest migrating has dropped as tourist numbers have gone up. We take a look at the delicate balancing act required to ensure the preservation of the migration with evergrowing travel demands. Also: ranked one of Africas growing companies by the Financial Times in 2024, Hubtel originally began two decades ago as a messaging company in Ghana. Since then, its turned into an e-payments and commerce behemoth with 23 offices across Ghana. We spoke to CEO Alex Bram about the companys pivot towards fintech, growth strategy, and the importance of staying purely self funded within Ghana.

programme.title: CNN Newsroom
programme.desc: CNN Newroom provides the most up to date news as it breaks and is the longest running show on the channel, airing twice a day Monday to Friday and throughout the day over the weekends. CNN has developed a lot since its founding in 1980 by American media proprietor Ted Turner as a 24 hour cable news channel. As an organisation, CNN have won multiple awards, including a network-record six news and documentary Emmy Awards in 2018.

programme.title: NASAs Unexplained Files
programme.desc: What do we really know about life beyond the realm of our planet? Disturbing discoveries about the rest of our universe have perplexed scientists, and the rest of the world, for as long as we can remember. Now, the files and discoveries of one of the worlds biggest independent agencies have been dug up, for thorough investigation. Each episode scrutinises questionable evidence, encounters and sightings, to shed some light on the unexplained files of NASA. Featuring testimonies of NASA insiders and scientists who have first hand experience of the enigmas, laying within our universe.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. programme.title: Salvage Hunters: Classic Cars
programme.desc: Drew Pritchard and Paul Cowland travel across the United Kingdom to uncover classic cars to buy, restore and sell on for a profit. The pair scour garages, barns and facilities to discover collectible cars which include the likes of the Morris Minor Traveller, Jaguar XJS, Rover P6 and a BMW 635 CSI among many others. The combination of Drews expertise of negotiation and deal-making and Pauls extensive mechanical knowledge makes them a formidable team ready to tackle anything challenging that comes their way.

programme.title: Expedition Unknown
programme.desc: American archaeologist, author and explorer Josh Gates explores the world to solve longstanding mysteries and legends that are yet to be solved. With no story too big, Josh travels across the globe to identify clues and secrets that could help him find the truth. First he must gather as much information about the case, before jetting off to pursue his leads. Whether its uncovering long lost Nazi treasures, unearthing the birth place of Jesus, deciphering the origin of Stonehenge or investigating the Vikings rise to power, Josh leaves no stone unturned in his quest for answers.

programme.title: Expedition X
programme.desc: Join our hosts, adventurer Josh Gates, scientist Phil Torres and paranormal researcher Jessica Chobot, as they travel around the planet uncovering the secrets behind supernatural phenomena, mythical beasts and alien activity. Each trip leads the team on a quest to reveal the bizarre truth of these fascinating stories. Epsiodes include a journey deep into the Cambodian jungle to search for a monster from a lost city; a spelunking expedition sees the team investigating the largest cave system in the world; an active volcano in Washington state might hold the clue to some extraterrestrial mysteries; and an exploration of a haunted dwelling in the Amazon causes panic in the middle of the night.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Baggage Battles
programme.desc: Featuring professional buyers including antique dealers, a production designer and an eCommerce expert, these expert buyers travel around the world to lost baggage auctions, estate auctions and police auctions to find the hidden treasure and items left behind or siezed by customs in order to make the greatest profit. This American docu-reality series created by The Travel Channel in 2012. Finding contents in baggage such as a bronze sculpture, jewellery including 18 karat gold and a legendary belt, these professionals prove why they have a name for themselves in their industry, finding hidden gems in hidden places.

programme.title: Treehouse Masters
programme.desc: Treehouse Masters is an American reality television series hosted by Pete Nelson, a treehouse builder. Pete and his team design and build all types of treehouses for clients across the country. The clients and Petes team are the people who never stop dreaming. Youll be surprised to know how many people want to get away from the noisy comfortable cities and live in close communion with mother nature. So getting a treehouse is their chance to live a dream. Every episode will amaze you because of Petes talent and incredible imagination. He can build any type of a treehouse, starting from a small simple ones to most complex residences with all modern communication. Every wish of a customer will be heard and fulfilled.

programme.title: Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. He has been in this for more than 25 years, and thanks to his passion and talent he updates interiors while keeping the historical charm and chic.

programme.title: Flippin RVs
programme.desc: The VIP RV. Justin and Anna hope a rare 1959 Airstream Globester will be a quick flip that will land them a deal to restore ten trailers for a vintage RV park. Can they seal the deal with the RV park and polish their new clients Airstream in time?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters
programme.desc: Reality series showing American house hunters who are considering joining the tiny-house revolution where people are choosing to live in smaller homes - often less than 55 square metres -and praising their benefits. In this property series realtors present three petite houses to prospective buyers. Some of the homes would be used as permanent residences whilst others could be a retreat to escape to. There are various reasons for the trend for tiny-living; some people are doing it for financial reasons, others are trying to live more ecologically and some yearn for a simpler lifestyle. When the potential tiny-homeowners are faced with the practical limitations of the properties on offer will they take the plunge and embrace the joys of tiny living? Or will they change their minds for more spacious accommodation?

programme.title: Tiny House Hunters

programme.title: Renovation Impossible
programme.desc: Russell Holmes turns a Texas couples outdated 70s house into a stylish home. Facing a tight budget and conflicting tastes he must find creative compromises.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: Hurricane Helene barrels north, causing massive flooding in Appalachia. As the deluge sweeps away one woman, a man jumps into the water to save her.

programme.title: Speed Cops
programme.desc: Road police on the hunt for posers and speeders all over Germany. The professionals know exactly whats impressive about cars - and whats illegal.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: The Autobahn A2
programme.desc: One of Europes busiest, most dangerous and most important highways. For many people its their place of work, and many more use it to travel across Europe.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A man climbs onto the hood of a school bus. A menacing man harasses a father and his son. A disgruntled driver shoots at another motorist.

programme.title: Road Rage
programme.desc: A group of drivers brawl in a Texas intersection. A man attacks a motorist. A driver gets into an intense exchange with construction workers.

programme.title: Gold Rush
programme.desc: Gold Rush is a reality television series that follows the placer gold mining efforts of various family-run mining companies in boundless north of America. The series focuses on the work process in the conditions of permafrost and working relations between the participants. The show has 10 seasons altogether. In some episodes participants start the adventure and travel to Alaska to search for gold because of financial issues. They do not have any previous experience and have to learn on the job. Then there appears several gold mining teams that compete with each other. In some episodes the teams move to South America. Admire the courage and determination of the team members in their unstoppable desire to become rich.

programme.title: In The Eye Of The Storm
programme.desc: Hurricane Helene barrels north, causing massive flooding in Appalachia. As the deluge sweeps away one woman, a man jumps into the water to save her.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Mike Whiteside and Robert Kulp are the hosts of Salvage Dawgs show that is about saving beautiful old things from buildings planned to be torn down. They and their talented crew teach the viewers how to repurpose old stuff into something new and useful instead of throwing it away. So if you are remodeling your home think twice before you get rid of anything. Get creative, have some fun and learn tips and tricks to help you build your skills. Learn how to transform old chairs into a functional bench, how to repurpose an old paneled door into a shelf and enjoy fantastic vintage pieces from the past.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: How Its Made
programme.desc: Have you ever wondered how things that surround us every day are produced? Find out about the whole process from the beginning to the end in a documentary television series How Its Made. The series demonstrates how various items like clothing and accessories, food, industrial products, cars, musical instruments and many more are manufactured. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. How the seemingly mundane are often the result of highly sophisticated engineering and production processes. This fascinating behind-the-scenes journey delves deep into the production of everyday modern items from surfboards to satchels and trombones to cricket bats.

programme.title: Salvage Hunters
programme.desc: Meet modern-day treasure hunter Drew Pritchard. With demanding customers, high turnover, and one of the biggest decorative salvage yards in the UK, Drew is constantly on the road, crisscrossing the country in search of derelict gems and forgotten remnants. Drew loves the thrill of the hunt and while he gets his hands dirty in the countrys architectural backwaters, his team of restorers is back at the shop giving old and rare finds a new lease on life!

programme.title: Scrappers
programme.desc: Meet the colourful characters that work in Polands scrap metal industry. Plus, a behind the scenes view of where the materials come from and where they go after the scrapyard.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: Chewy Design Co. owner Brett Lewis turns an old mail van into a home. Plus, he transforms a Mexican food truck for Chef Rolando to take out on the open road.

programme.title: Van Go
programme.desc: Brett must get creative to fit four beds, three school desks and a kitchen inside a brand-new van for an adventure-ready family of five.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. programme.title: Swamp Loggers
programme.desc: This American reality television series follows Bobby Goodson and the crew of Goodsons All Terrain Logging as they log (cut trees, process them and move them to a location for transport) the swamps of North Carolina. With the constant difficulties they encounter- bad weather, poor road conditions and equipment failures, as well as uncertainties concerning lumber buyers, land owners (from whose property Goodsons extract timber) and saw mills, these guys have their work cut out for them.

programme.title: Swamp Loggers

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Ant Anstead: Born Mechanic
programme.desc: Ant buys two Jaguar XJS, hoping one can donate spare parts. But with brake problems and the gearstick floppy, are they just double trouble?

programme.title: How Do They Do It?
programme.desc: As the modern world becomes progressively automated and mechanised its easy to become detached from how things are made and how they work. The hit series returns to uncover the miraculous feats of engineering which underpin life in the 21st century. Who would have thought how exciting it would be to watch a cupcake, formula 1 race car or gummy vitamins being made?

programme.title: Fast n Loud
programme.desc: Fast N Loud is a reality styled TV show featuring Richard Rawlings and his crew from the Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage. For most people old rusty cars in garages or open spaces are nothing but junk, but not for these guys. For them it is a perfect chance to reconstruct such vehicles and make some money. The old run-down cars are restored flawlessly and are able to run steadily for the next 10 years for sure. Richard and his crew work really hard to make a name for themselves and have become a huge success thanks to their enormous talents.

programme.title: Survival instinct
programme.desc: Each week, a new pair of total strangers are faced with the ultimate survival challenge: survive for 21 days together with no clothes or supplies in some of the most dangerous environments in the world. In addition to the landscape itself working against the duo, the local wildlife stalk them as well. Of course, the biggest complication for any of the couples might end up being their own clashing egos. Will they make it out alive, or will they fall victim to the wilderness? They must fall back on their most primal instincts to ensure they dont become prey themselves.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: The final challenges test bushcraft, fire-making and bow skills. All competitors are seconds away from winning the $100,000 prize.

programme.title: Maritime Masters: Expedition Antarctica
programme.desc: Antarctica bound, the team must prepare the first expedition to Jacques Cousteau Island before attempting the first night-time commercial sub-dive in Huatulco, Mexico.

programme.title: 100 Days Wild
programme.desc: The brute harshness of Alaskas wilderness is no joke, with hostile weather and dangerous animals constantly lurking on the horizon. In this documentary series, a group of seven strangers give up their creature comforts to build a self-sustaining community along the Tanana River, and they have 100 days before the biting chill of winter arrives. They must quickly learn to work as a team if their makeshift community is going to work, learning to hunt, gather and implement basic structures that will keep them dry and warm. Will they be able to handle the wilderness?

programme.title: Salvage Hunters: The Restorers
programme.desc: Expert craftsmen are bringing Drew Pritchards finds back to life and restore them to their former glory. Drew hunts for treasures such as derelict gems and forgotten remnants across the country. And then he and his team do the restoration turning trash to gold, so that worn objects become shining gems for which Drews customers want to pay a lot of money. All kinds of items can and will be restored, starting from a century-old suitcase to an ancient coffee machine, from a ravaged carousel horse to a large railway clock.

programme.title: Misfit Garage
programme.desc: Misfit Garage is a reality TV show, a spin off from Fast N Loud. It features two of the mechanics fired from that shows Dallas, Texas-based Gas Monkey Garage, Tom Smith and Jordan Butler, as well as Thomas Weeks and Scot McMillan, who together start a new company, Fired Up Garage. The crew run into former co-workers of the shop they were all fired from by Richard Rawlings and who they later find out is their new shop landlord. It takes a lot of courage to face the problems from the past and deal with the challenging present, but this is exactly what the guys do.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid: Last One Standing
programme.desc: The final challenges test bushcraft, fire-making and bow skills. All competitors are seconds away from winning the $100,000 prize.

programme.title: Maritime Masters: Expedition Antarctica
programme.desc: Antarctica bound, the team must prepare the first expedition to Jacques Cousteau Island before attempting the first night-time commercial sub-dive in Huatulco, Mexico.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Buy, repair and restore and then resell a classic car in order to make profit- this is what Wheeler Dealers is about. The budget is limited, though you can see some exclusive and rare cars. Mike Brewer, a British dealer chooses the car carefully and hands it over to the mechanic, first Edd China, later Ant Anstead to be fixed and upgraded. The hosts are real masters of their trade, it seems they can bring life even to a piece of metal. It does not matter if you are a life-long car enthusiast or do not even have a driving license you will admire the results of hard work from the beginning to the end of the long uneasy restoring process.

programme.title: Wild Australia with Ray Mears
programme.desc: In Victoria just south west of Melbourne in the You Yangs National Park Ray Mears meets up with researcher Janine Duffy in a dry eucalyptus forest. They go in search of koalas and find a young male who nervously tries to establish his own territory.Ray moves down to the open grasslands and tracks a mob of Eastern Grey kangaroos. He visits the Mount Rothwell Conservation Reserve and meets an unusual marsupial - a predator - that is almost extinct on the mainland of Australia - a Tiger Quoll - smaller relative of the Tasmanian Devil. Finally Ray journeys through a Wet Eucalyptus forest to Lake Elizabeth and canoeing across the quiet waters finds himself surrounded by rare and unique duck billed platypuses

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Animal Doctors
programme.desc: Explore how animals developed over time and generations their own medicine and health care strategies. How have these been passed onto early humans ? Questioning traditional boundaries between human and animal, we will travel from Central African Republic, to Tanzania, from the US to France with the leading experts in animal behaviour. Todays science revisits the birth of animal intelligence and culture.

programme.title: Herding Sheep In Iceland
programme.desc: Starting at the beginning of September, the Northern Lights unveil their magical patterns on Icelands starry skies. At the same time, Icelanders celebrate the "Retir": sheep and horses are herded to the lowlands. 4,500 sheep and 800 horses spend 3 to 4 months in the untamed highlands. Now, they are rounded up. No single farmer can herd so many animals to the lowlands. The entire community helps.

programme.title: Coral Sea Dreaming
programme.desc: Coral Sea Dreaming enters into the very heart of life - and death - on a coral reef. It is a story that spans 500 million years and stars some of the most exotic and wonderous marine creatures on earth. Coral is the planets greatest natu- ral architect, and coral reefs boast the highest biodiversity of any ecosystem.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: As warfare has evolved, many military techniques and technologies have been adapted for use in urban settings by police units around the world. This episode provides viewers with an intimate perspective on what it feels like to be "inside the heads" of special police personnel, and how their use of military-style strategies and equipment allows them to save lives. From riot control in South Africa and the lessons learned from its excesses, to Los Angeles Police Chief Robert Gates creation of an elite police S.W.A.T team, CQB will showcase how, over the past 30 years, the fight against urban crime has evolved into a military scenario, with both sides using increasingly complex weaponry and tactics.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: The team investigate a disused factory in Burton-Upon-Trent. Reports of paranormal happenings are common and the team are ready for anything.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Hoylake and investigate a building known as The Parade. Dating back to 1909, this once former school, still seems to have ghostly pupils and teachers taking class.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: And were off! We learn the history of the world famous Kentucky Derby. Then, call your shot as we learn about one of Americas most famous brands, Louisville Slugger. Also, we zip line in the worlds only underground zip line attraction and visit the Ali Center.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: Nairobi is the capital of Kenya and one of the most fascinating cities in Africa. On our visit well see the colonial architecture of a bygone era and the ultra-modern side of town as well. Well learn the truth behind the "Out of Africa" story and our host gets eye-to-eye with some endangered giraffes.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is definitely the land of the elephant. Large herds of pachyderms roam this marshy park putting on a show for whoever wants to watch. But thats not the only big boys of this park—buffalo, lion and a host of hoofed game make this a wonder to behold.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Our chosen route is the coral archipelago of Los Roques, our sail boat is pushed forward by the trade winds as we go to explore the small "cayos" in the region. The route chosen by our expert Capitan Raul and his eccentric skipper Mar, means that we will make our first stop at Carenero Island, a place so full of wonderful colours. But it is Cayos de Agua that steals our hearts: the light that surrounds this small strip of sand which is inhabited only by birds, makes this one of the most beautiful beaches in the world. As we weigh anchor, we sail to Dos Mosquises, headquarters of the Fundacion Cientifica los Roques, where an expert marine biologist shows us the different species of marine turtle. Here the Fundacion has chosen to guard and protect these marine animals, breeding them in captivity until they are one year old, then releasing them into the sea.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Our journey to Cuba begins in its capital city Havana, a city of architecture and sea. The sea that Ernest Hemingway loved so much, and the city that he fell in love with as soon as he saw it, so much so he decided to make his home here, today it is a museum that must be visited in his honour. A deep and profound union between men and the sea can be found in the Santeria and in Yemaya, the Dea madre of the Yoruba and of all of the Orisha, the guardian spirits of Cuba. It is the Babbalao, the person that represents the highest order of priesthood in the Santeria, who will explain to us Yemayà and the relationship that the Cubans have with the sea and underwater diving. To continue our journey between the sacred and the profane, we go along the southern coast of Cuba, to the deep waters of the Cenotes, a place that seems to be suspended between a dream and reality, where Yemayà, goddess of the sea, seems to accompany Ochun, the goddess of the freshwater rivers.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: O Say can you see? Were in Baltimore, MD. Well learn about the Battle of Baltimore at Fort McHenry and the inspiration of the Star Spangled Banner. Then we dig deep into the history of Baltimores most famous resident, Edgar Allan Poe. Well sift through a huge collection of pop art and collectibles at the Geppi Museum, and learn about cracking codes at the National Cryptology museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Get your kicks on Route 66 in Flagstaff, AZ. Duck and cover! Were headed to the famous Barringer meteor crater outside of town. Then we scan the stars for heavenly bodies at Lowell Observatory. Well learn the history of the region at the Northern Arizona History Museum, and finally swing from their many ponderosa pines at Flagstaff Extreme adventure park.

programme.title: Out Of Town Adventures
programme.desc: Outta Town Adventures travels both near and far to discover the best advenures the destinations have to offer. Season 1 visits attractions from California to Rwanda, Switzerland, Iceland, Utah, Zambia, Mexico, The Grand Canyon, Georgia (the Eastern European one) Louisiana, Hawaii, Mauritius and Seychelles. This TV series is dedicated to presenting history, culture and geography in a fun and pisitive way. It encourages people to explore this beautiful world - something that starts with simply getting out of town!

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Travel Quest
programme.desc: A remote Pacific island thats a divers paradise. This remote Pacific island is a divers paradise and Bill takes advantage of this by diving with giant Manta Rays the size of a small plane. The craziest dive though is when he feeds dozens of sharks with no protective gear. Trying to top that on land, Bill makes a mind blowing deal with a local chief to film where no one has filmed before…The Forbidden Island.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe. We are again sending cameras to the edge of the solar system giving us new insights into the evolution of our worlds.

programme.title: New Frontier
programme.desc: These are the the Moons of the gas giants. Each a unique and mysterious world of its own. Some have oceans of water, geysers of Sulphur or atmospheres of plastic. Some are just now being seen at the outer rim of our solar system, all are worthy of much more scrutiny.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: Amongst the 1190 islands that make up the Maldives archipelago we can find a real pearl: Huvafen Fushi. Suites that look out over the water, natural pools and uncontaminated long beaches surround the unique underwater SPA, between corals and sea creatures. Those are the real luxuries that the Maldives donate to us: We explore a coral nursery cultivated by an Austrian marine biologist, a colony of sting-rays, who come close to the shore at sunset, sharks that move around close to the resort and can be seen from the overwater suites. All together with other fishes that parade in front of us, as if they were on the cat-walk of a fashion show

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of the Duke of York, an all comfort cruise boat, we sail one of the most beautiful seas of the world: the Maldives archipelago. During our journey we will explore rich diving points, long sandy strips - the Finolhu - and deserted sandy islands - the Bodu Finolhu - both perfect locations for relaxing and having fun. Our journey also gives us the possibility to taste the slow daily life of Guraidhoo Island, a small sample of Maldivian traditions, between fishing, boat renovation and the Muslim faith. A bit more chaotic, however, is life in Malè, the capital of the Maldives: a city immersed in confusion and dotted with monuments, Mosques and multi-colored fish and vegetable markets.

programme.title: Of Boats And Men
programme.desc: Travelling by boat bears a priceless sense of Freedom and offers endless new vistas to all passengers. Across waterways around the world Boats are an essential tool of daily life whether they carry goods, serve as utilities or services in remote areas.

programme.title: Stolen Treasures
programme.desc: Its the biggest museum in the world…the museum of artworks stolen over the centuries and never rediscovered. These works haunt the nightmares of their owners, and occupy the days of hundreds of police officers across the world, as well as those of a handful of private agencies; no country or museum of importance can claim to have been spared. According to Interpol, art theft is the fourth largest criminal trade, after the drug trade, the weapons trade and money laundering. How could it be otherwise, when the soaring price of art propels the value of some paintings into the tens of millions of Euros? This world appears to be full of mysteries. Crime syndicates rub shoulders with petty criminals and the police care more about recovering the items than they do about arresting the perpetrators.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. Have a look at some stunning locations in Alaska, Mexico, Argentina, Japan, Tahiti, Africa, Costa Rica, Norway, Hawaii and whitewater kayaking, extreme big mountain skiing, windsurfing, kiteboarding, extreme snowboarding and big wave surfing that push the limits of possibility. The focus is on compelling personalities and great storytelling.

programme.title: Nomads
programme.desc: Follow breathtaking travel adventures of some well known athletes of extreme sports. programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Presented by Peadar King, this series illustrates the human consequences of global economic inequalities and human rights violations, by focusing on how people encounter these issues on a daily basis. At the heart of Africa, the Congo for many people will always be associated with Joseph Conrads early twentieth-century novel the Heart of Darkness, a title that has become a by-word for the country. And for Benjamin and David, two former child soldiers, and Funaha held as a sex slave by one of the many militias that continue to terrorise the country, that metaphor remains a daily reality. The film explores how this seemingly never-ending conflict impacts on the people of North Kivu.

programme.title: Desperate Hours
programme.desc: Disasters in the air and misfortunes at sea grab our attention because of the unusually large number of fatalities involved. But its not even necessary to leave dry land for a terrible disaster to happen. Rail journeys and even just getting in your car can be fraught with disaster. Thats the focus for this instalment of Desperate Hours - road and rail disasters. We will examine the causes of such accidents, be that the powers of nature or human folly. We are about to explore the worst of the worst destructive events from an ordinary day on Nigerian roads to a disastrous display of human error in Santiago de Compostella when the driver of a loaded passenger train went about 115 km/h over the established speed limit and drove his train straight into a wall. So buckle up; youre in for a bumpy ride…

programme.title: Desperate Hours

programme.title: Organic Panic
programme.desc: Fun in the sun and relaxing on the beach are nourishing for the spirit. But is your vacation ruining the earth? Actress and model Angela Asher travels to tropical Costa Rica to find out if luxury can be sustainable. She visits Lapa Rios, a gorgeous eco-‐lodge perched in the Costa Rican rainforest, to learn about how they incorporate organic and sustainable principals into an indulgent getaway - a truly organic vacation. At the Los Sueños Marriott resort near Jaco Beach, Costa Rica, she is introduced to the methods modern resorts use to conserve water and energy while providing a five-‐star experience. While not organic per se, the Marriott insists that their green practices have a much larger positive impact on the planet when compared to those of any (smaller) eco lodge

programme.title: WWII Documentary Films
programme.desc: Award-winning documentary films produced to enlighten future generations about the personal stories of the WWII generations.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: After the fall of the soviet union many countries remained in dispute in the early nineties despite eastern Europes independence. In 1994 a bitter conflict broke out between the forces of the Chechnen independence movement and the Russian regular army. Despite overwhelming manpower, weaponry and air support, the Russian forces were unable to establish effective permanent control over the mountainous area due to many successful Chechen guerrilla raids. Improvised Explosive Devices were one of the most effective methods employed in these disastrous raids and were the back drop to many Close Quarter Battle scenarios exchanged between the two sides.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Indris Seid Yimer and Emyet Assen Worakis lives have been utterly transformed in the last thirty years. In 1984, they, their families and their community were engulfed in famine and devastation, a famine memorably described by BBC journalist Michael Buerk as "the closest thing to hell on Earth". Set in the Wollo area, the epicentre of the 1984 famine, the film tells their story. Other contributions featured are from people like entrepreneur Samuel Alemu and financier Ermyas Amelga. It also showcases the hauntingly beautiful UNESCO World Heritage site in Lalibela.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Built in 1861 Mill Street Barracks is steeped in rich history. It has accommodated many branches of the armed forces throughout its life. Like many other barracks it has also been used as a morgue making it a prime location for the supernatural.

programme.title: The Past Hunters
programme.desc: Derek Acorahs The Past Hunters travel to Knutsford and investigate a former Crown Court. Multiple people have been sentenced to death and life in prison, but will the team encounter any of its former inmates tonight?

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Rip Files
programme.desc: The R.I.P. Files features a group of paranormal investigators, who use intuitive abilities and a deep knowledge of metaphysical techniques to interact with the entities they encounter at haunted locations. They encourage the spirits to share their stories in their own words through amazing EVPs and other evidence that is bridging the gap between the worlds of science and spirituality.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: The Saints come marching in as we tour the iconic St. Louis Cathedral and the mysterious Ursuline Convent in New Orleans. We delve into Mardi Gras history at Mardi Gras World and visit the National WWII Museums world class collection.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This is definitely the land of the elephant. Large herds of pachyderms roam this marshy park putting on a show for whoever wants to watch. But thats not the only big boys of this park—buffalo, lion and a host of hoofed game make this a wonder to behold.

programme.title: Journeys in Africa
programme.desc: This ancient ruined city, lost to history, was one of the most powerful in the world during its prime. The architectural sophistication and sheer size will amaze. Then Journeys heads out to the deep ocean for some big game fishing. Will we land the big one or return empty handed?

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: On board of the strangest Cessna in the whole of Venezuela. Vittorio, a man who feels that his personal space is more in the air rather than on the round, is taking us from the North to the South, leaving from Gran Roque Island. We first fly over the Los Roques archipelago, to then land on a runway made of sand, on the island of La Tortuga, a long strip of land and sand that is inhabited only by a few fishermen. Flying again we follow the waterways of this region and re-fuel in Ciudad Bolivar, a city on the banks of the great Orinoco river, we then fly over the vast and savage territory of the Gran Sabana dominated by the Tepuy and the famous Canaima waterfall, until we reach our final destination: The Salto Angel, the highest waterfall in the world, which is named after its discoverer, the pilot Jimmy Angel, the idol of our friend Vittorio.

programme.title: Around the World in 80 Islands
programme.desc: In this incredible eco-system of mangroves, reefs and sandy sea beds of the labyrinth of small islands and channels that make up the archipelago of Los Jardines de la Reina, in Cuba, you can find marine birds, many different species of fish and mammals native to this area such as the hutia. However, the main attraction of this place are the sharks that come here to feed in great numbers. So in the company of an expert diver Noel and a biologist Andrea, we meet the two principle species of shark that populate these waters: the silk sharks, Noels faithful playmates and the most feared, the Caribbean reef shark. Noel takes us underwater water scuba-diving with Andrea in apnoea: they both show us that these sharks are not dangerous.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: We visit Canadas capital city on a hill in Ottawa, Ontario. Well sail down the famous Rideau Canal locks. We go deep into Ottawas cold war history at the Diefenbunker, as well as, explore Canadas military history at the Canadian War Museum. Then we head up the Peace Tower and take a look at the library of Parliament. Finally, we learn about Canadas first nations tribes at the Canadian History Museum.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Were headed upstate to Albany and Saratoga Springs. Well take the Albany capital tour and see five former NY governors who would become US Presidents. Then, well board the USS Slater and see how America defended its fleet against German U-boats in WWII. Well sample the mineral water in Saratoga Springs, and bet the farm at their famous thoroughbred raceway. Then, well learn how important the Battle of Saratoga was for Americas future at Saratoga battlefield.
